name: Creepy Crawly
description:
-Submission to the Game Dev Knockout Jam (Round 4)-

TASK: Remake the classic game Centipede

Escape from deep within a dungeon, infested with creepy crawlies

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys or WASD
Shoot/Interact - Z or Space
Exit level/Return to menu - P

Credits:
-CRT Shader
-Music from FreeMusicArchive
--Komiku - Poupi Great Adventures
--Komiku - The adventure
--Komiku - Ending
--Monplaisir - Defeat
--Monplaisir - Victory
--Monplaisir - Level 3
